name: Butterfly Simulator
description:
*****Butterfly Simulator*****
Do you love butterflies? The close cousin of the moth. The Lepidoptera are here!! Control your very own butterfly in this beautiful 3D insect world. Create your own colony, feed the king, find Worker and attack winged Lepidoptera, and go out in search of the insect bosses. The ultimate winged insect simulator you have been looking for. High quality 3D graphics, Super gameplay, and smooth controls. Customize your insect to be Monarch, painted lady, and more varieties.

Enter the insect world as a young butterfly and build your family. You will also find yourself in head to head battles against Spiders , Ant colonies, Ladybugs, Rhino Beetle, Wasp, and Honey Bees, and Scorpion.

Top Game Features:

** Open World Style RPG game
** Fast paced and action packed animal simulator
** Customize your butterfly wings
** Beautifully colored wings
** Huge 3D Insect World Map
** Part survival and part animal simulator
** Cool insect sound effects and weather


How to play:

Part 1 : Build your Butterfly Colony

Part 2 : Find and Defeat the Bosses
--Bosses include Giant Ants, Rhino Beetle, Butterfly, Bees, Spider, and Scorpion.

Part 3 : Defeat the enemy Beetle Clans

Part 4 : Find and Defeat the Super Bosses
